properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Maty Jesosy hisolo ahy re
Indro fitiavana.
Niaritra irery tanaty alim-be
Indro fitiavana.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Inona no hitanao
Amiko ratsy izao (tsy 'zao)
No dia nafoinao na dia ny ainao ?
Tompo Ã´, ambarao (ambarao).

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He ! voahombo na tsy diso re
Indro fitiavana
Nafoin'ny Rainy na Zanaka e !
Indro fitiavana tokoa.
Inona no hitanao, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Naka ny toerako. Nahoana re ?
Indro fitiavana
'Zaho mpanota sy meloka be
Indro fitiavana tokoa
Inona no hitanao, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tsy foiko mantsy ho faty Ianao
'Zaho fitiavana
Ka dia nafoiko ny aiko ho anao
'Zaho fitiavana.
Fa ny iriko izao
Ka moa ve mba foinao ?
Ho Ahy anio sy ho mandrakizay
Ny Fitiavanao !
